entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 6. POP 40%
entry.summary: Clear this evening then partly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light before morning. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 6:42 PM EDT Sunday 19 March 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High plus 2. POP 40%
